SpringControllerLoader - Class in org.jogger.config.spring
This is a ControllerLoader implementation based on the Spring Framework.
SpringControllerLoader() - Constructor for class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringControllerLoader
 
SpringInterceptors - Class in org.jogger.config.spring
This is Interceptors implementation that exposes the SpringInterceptors.add(String, String...) method that allows subclasses to add declared beans as interceptors.
SpringInterceptors() - Constructor for class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
 
SpringJoggerTest - Class in org.jogger.test.spring
This is a utility class that you extend when testing Jogger applications using Spring.
